# omni

This package contains a set of internal functions and templates for Omni
Institute. An overview of the functions can be found on the [reference
page](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/). Long-form
documentation of how the package works can be found on the [R @ Omni
website](https://ratomni.netlify.app/).

*This template was created for the Omni Institute, a Colorado-based
nonprofit social science consultancy that provides integrated research
and evaluation, capacity building, and data utilization services to
accelerate positive social change. If you are interested in adapting
this OMNI branded template please contact <omni@omni.org>.*

## Installation

You can install `omni` from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("rfortherestofus/omni", force = TRUE)
```

You can rerun this code at any point to get the newest version of the
package.

## Old Version

If you want to install the old version of the package (prior to the 2025
rebrand), you can do it with the following code:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("rfortherestofus/omni", force = TRUE, ref = "old")
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`callout_box()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/callout_box.md)
  : Create a callout box
- [`create_website()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/create_website.md)
  : Create a new Quarto website
- [`ggplot_defaults()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/ggplot_defaults.md)
  : Resets to default setting
- [`html_report()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/html_report.md)
  : Omni HTML Report
- [`icon_text()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/icon_text.md)
  : Text for Icon-Text-Grid
- [`icon_text_grid()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/icon_text_grid.md)
  : Place icons and texts on grid
- [`number_emphasis()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/number_emphasis.md)
  : Create a number emphasis element
- [`omni_colors()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/omni_colors.md)
  : Function to extract WVC colors as hex codes
- [`omni_icon()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/omni_icon.md)
  : Get one of the pre-defined Omni icons
- [`omni_icons()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/omni_icons.md)
  : List all available Omni icons
- [`omni_page_break()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/omni_page_break.md)
  : Create page break
- [`omni_pal()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/omni_pal.md)
  : Function to interpolate a OMNI color palette
- [`omni_table()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/omni_table.md)
  : OMNI Table Function
- [`pdf_report()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/pdf_report.md)
  : Omni Paged PDF Report
- [`pkg_resource()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/pkg_resource.md)
  : Load resources - shortcut to system.file
- [`qualtrics_apply_labels()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/qualtrics_apply_labels.md)
  : Apply labels to survey
- [`qualtrics_connect()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/qualtrics_connect.md)
  : Connect to Qualtrics
- [`qualtrics_get_labels()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/qualtrics_get_labels.md)
  : Get labels
- [`qualtrics_get_survey()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/qualtrics_get_survey.md)
  : Get survey by name of ID
- [`qualtrics_list_surveys()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/qualtrics_list_surveys.md)
  : Get surveys
- [`qualtrics_register()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/qualtrics_register.md)
  : Write API key to the system - run only once
- [`quote_box()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/quote_box.md)
  : Create a quote box
- [`read_renviron_qualtrics()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/read_renviron_qualtrics.md)
  : Read Renviron Qualtrics variables
- [`remove_cover_page_pdf()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/remove_cover_page_pdf.md)
  : Remove cover page from PDF
- [`scale_color_omni_continuous()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/scale_color_omni_continuous.md)
  : Continuous color scale based on OMNI colors
- [`scale_color_omni_discrete()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/scale_color_omni_discrete.md)
  : Discrete color scale based on OMNI colors
- [`scale_fill_omni_continuous()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/scale_fill_omni_continuous.md)
  : Continuous fill scale based on OMNI colors
- [`scale_fill_omni_discrete()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/scale_fill_omni_discrete.md)
  : Discrete fill scale based on OMNI colors
- [`set_client_defaults()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/set_client_defaults.md)
  : Update defaults to OMNI's client theme
- [`set_omni_defaults()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/set_omni_defaults.md)
  : Update defaults to OMNI's theme
- [`theme_client()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/theme_client.md)
  : Create theme for OMNI's clients.
- [`theme_omni()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/theme_omni.md)
  : OMNI Institute ggplot2 theme
- [`word_report()`](https://rfortherestofus.github.io/omni/reference/word_report.md)
  : Omni Word Report
